features: ✅ 【2500W High Temperature & Pressure Steam Cleaner】 The working power of the steam cleaner is 2500W, its heats up quickly in 10 seconds, reaching 221°F/105°C, which is super powerful and can easily and thoroughly loosen and dissolve dirt, cut grease, dirt and expel stains.

🎅🎅【1500ML Water Tank】 This steamer for cleaning is equipped with a 1500 ml water tank，can be used continuously for 30-70 minutes without frequent refilling. The steam cleaner has a visible plastic cover, which allows a longer cleaning time, is easier to refill and can add water during work.improving your cleaning work efficiency.The top folding handle and opening design make it easy to add water or detergent.

✅ 【6-level Adjustable Knob】 The handheld steam cleaner has 6-level adjustable knob, you could adjust the steam to control steam intensity to meet your different daily cleaning needs. At the same time, this hand-held steam cleaner releases about 3 bar of high-pressure steam, high temperature steam fast heating within 10-seconds to loosen and dissolve dirt.

✅ 【Three Different Brush Heads】 With 3 different brush heads, the High Pressure steamer can not only be used to clean the kitchen, clean the wall, stove, smoke, microwave oven, washing machine, refrigerator, car and carpet, but also be widely used in kitchen, bathroom, furniture, car and so on.

✅ 【Ergonomic design & Various Accessories Included】 Comes with an extended Nozzle, you do not need to carry the water tank all the time. Overall weighing less than 4lbs.【Accessories Included】:1pc Extension nozzle, 2pcs round steel brush, 2pcs round hairbrush, 2pcs large oval hairbrush, 4pcs waterproof ring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great if you get around to using it Lol
reviews.reviewText: So who has time to steam clean, right? But once I finally got around to putting this steam cleaner together (it comes with a ton of accessories which is both awesome and a tad daunting) it worked pretty well! Before I had just been using a rotating brush only a tad more powerful than a toothbrush so with this steam it cleaned way better than that! However it didn't work miracles like I still have water spots and hard water stains but it did take off a little mildew that was accumulating in my kid's shower.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this portable steamer specifically to clean the tracks in my windows and sliding glass doors. We live on a farm and it is a constant battle for me to keep the dirt cleaned up. Between the animals and the dirt, my floors and surfaces can build up with dirt quickly. I have used this steamer to clean the tracks on the back sliding door twice and both times it has worked well. It has many heads and attachments with brushes that you can use for different jobs. I have not used it for removing stains or anything, so I cannot speak on that, however, I can tell you that it quickly and easily cleaned the tracks on my windows and doors. I love that I can clean without using harsh chemicals to get this dirt up. The steam does all the work! So for me, it works as intended. The only downsides I have found are that the water reservoir is small and that the power cord is short. That does make it a little cumbersome to work with but not a dealbreaker for me. I have purchased a couple handheld steamers in the past and this steamer performs comparatively to them. I think the more I use it and be comfortable with it the better it will be for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed Steam Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: This handheld steam cleaner did not meet my expectations. I tried different attachments and potency without a positive result. It heats up pretty quickly and it removes loose dirt but not water stains or other stains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Got this to deep clean a few items around the house and so far so good. It heats up very fast and gets to work. I have cleaned my sink, some hats, grout, and a dirty air intake grate. it's small enough to tuck away when not in use and all the of adapters help for various situations. the extender came in hand a few times.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Convenient to use, easy to store
reviews.reviewText: This handheld steam cleaner is a bit of a mixed bag for me.Pro:Small and easy to storeLightweight to moveComes with many attachments/adaptersHeats up fastSteam is easy to controlRemoves loose dirtCon:Cord is extremely short (I needed to use an extension cord)Not very effective for stainsTank is not very large, may need to keep refillingLid has no latch and can fall off while using the steamer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I picked up this steamer to help clean my bathroom. Overall I'm very happy with it. The steam starts flowing quickly and is easily managed with the control wheel. The tank isn't very large but lasts a long enough time to clean.I only have a couple complaints about it, most of all is short power cord. It's about 5' long and just isn't enough for many situations. I also wish the lid was secured or latched on. I didn't have a problem with it but it could easily fall off if tipped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer does pretty well. It is easy to use and easy to store. Heats up fairly quickly and isn't too bulky when using it. Doesn't deep clean quite as well as expectes but still does a good job.
